post.body: LOL. Sorry chica. I feel your pain..that is my life DAILY *sigh* kids. *shakes head*
Amen! Definately my problem.
Oooh...was I supposed to go on through the REAL web? *sigh* I'm such a techie moron
Funny! Had a prob last wk wrkng out WiiFitMommii details while I ate chocolate. Lots and lots of chocolate. THAT was wrong! ;)
If it wasn't the WiiFitMommiis party.. wouldn't feel need to interupt REAL human interaction with VIRTUAL human interaction
Service unavailable due to server overload. Nooo...not twitter?! System overload? (sarcasm)
Excellent! Thank you!
Good for him...and Good For You!!
Umm...should I consider that a problem? Doesn't sound so good when I put it in writing!! LOL
Ahh..thanks! Can't believe they are on the same night Grrrr. I'll sneak to the bathroom and tweet I think! LOL
Of all things..can't go to my own Twitter Party tonight! Want to follow silently from my phone at DH's partner christmas dinner!
No I just turned on notifications on my follows page...and then I get into a web browser...really annoying.
I have a blackberry pearl... is it a site or do I look for it on twitter home?
OH! Christmas Cards!! I knew there was somthing else I was supposed to do today!!!
You are a ROCK STAR!! WOOT!
It is simply ridiculous. DH on the phone with police now! Keep your fingers crossed
This is FABULOUS ...how very exciting for you!!
Thanks! I'm heading off to watch tv and knit ...need to make sure @cynchrys has figured out her knitting first :)
Fantastic! Our night just turned around as well! We may have located our stolen tailgate!! Woo Hoo!
Hey there! Having a good day?
Did you get a chance to look at those replies? Does it make any sense?
Just in the knick of time... :)
ROFLMAO!!
Oh..and by the way..you are my 500 follow :) Grand prize? A very, very, grateful and happy me ;)
You are AWESOME! That was so much fun to read!!
I didn't know that there WERE any kroger..didn't have a 2008...didn't start couponing until late summer :)
http://is.gd/bbjm
Thought so...that is how I found you! LOL Saw the comment...finding a link for you :)
Good to know! Passed it on to SIL @AlyHethcoat
Nope...went from desktop...thought it would be like other updates...will try to go from phone when I get a minute Thx
I tried to a few days ago but for some reason wouldn't download? Stupid ?: I downloaded it to my comp first? Or straight to phone?
Awwww. Those are the best moments...hands down. So sweet :)
I find that most music on SNL ends up being less than enjoyable. Goodnight!
LOL...maybe a beer would help her sleep..hmmmmm LOL
I picked up the pace with daytime nursing today :)
Hey, thanks :) I'm still not feeling fabulous about it ... don't want her to stop nursing all together...
He is able to have some and stop instead of gorging himself (he is almost 3)
we got a lot of slack for keeping him off sugar for so long...but it paid off. Now he knows how it makes him feel
I made some carrot cake type thing with apple juice concentrate...and frosting that used geletin and cream cheese?
I KNOW! This one was even faster than #1 *sigh* This is when nature gets cruel and make you start missing the *baby* part!
I LOVE knitting, makes me happy. Despise having to choose between blogging and knitting.
oh I will. Unfortunately clots are olld hat to me. i wil be out today!
ok, thx. Got a blood clot from the iv site from last wknd but we are dealing w it. Ill be home to make cookies soon!
still in the stupid hospital. Should get out later today. Brother in town for holidays and coming to entertain the kids
congrats to you! How very exciting
try. Naturalbabies.com . Colleen is super helpful and will pricematch
still here. Out later today is the plan!
feel your pain lov both kids pic line antis after ds bc MRSA in csection
hep short term but lovenox for the long haul. Lov ok w preggo and bf
Thanks for the RT earlier! ;)
Congrats...on your quickbooks...and on your date!!! Wooo!
I did cd with both so ask if you have questions!
Don't have to wash them every use...just when stinky or soiled :) http://is.gd/bqRK Might help some :)
I'm all about slouchy days...and I'm allll about the "Daddy Dash" to look presentable before he gets here! LOL
Oh right! Me too! I must have just caught that wrong...thought you were feeling bad..couldn't have that!! :)
Must wake up DD to go and get DS from Mommy's Morning Out. Why does the time go so quickly? Ummm... Twitter, perhaps?
Also looking for info on apps for blackberry...specifically how to use office on phone...excel specifically
Is there a separate mobile app for Twitter? Something besides turning on your device and watching on mobile web?
Goodnight tweets. Must fold laundry and head to bed :) Tweetcha later
I'm indulging in my guilty pleasure: DVR'd soap operas... I watch them so often it is just Halloween! LOL
Retweeting @twincident: Anyone written something good about companies using Facebook ? I need to read it...asap! DM @twincident with link.
Mornin' tweeps. WiiFit back on shelves at Toys R Us this am $149 #wiimoms
Stopped in to say goodnight my tweeps.... this night is dedicated to knitting and coupon clipping...I must step away from the computer
Are you a fan of #wiimoms and the WiiFitMommiis New Year, New You Challenge? Join us on Facebook, too!
Retweeting @LeapFrog: Tag books are just $9.99 this week at leapfrog.com!
Did you know you can order your 2009 Entertainment Book for $15 and Free shipping? http://is.gd/bbmS
Did you know WiiFitMommiis are on Facebook? If you are too be sure to join our group! #wiimoms
$100 Land's End Giftcard!!: I'm really digging being a part of Maria Bailey's MomSelect. I'm fairly new to it so.. http://tinyurl.com/5t4ude
Anyone play the CVS game online vs in store? Wondering how that works out... seems like they have loads of online deals right now...
Yesterday morning it was 60 degrees...8 by bedtime. Seriously. 52 degree change in less than 12 hours.
More Deals on Toys: Some more great deals from Amazon.com on toys!We sat down last night and wrote out what we a.. http://tinyurl.com/6dme7y
Good day twitterland. I don't think I tweeted at all yesterday...AMAZING. Sick as a dog and hoping I'm better for my trip with DH on Thurs
Goodnite tweeps. I have to go and clean the kitchen before I can go to bed *BLAH*
Get some amazing deals at amazon on Melissa and Doug wooden toys...and $10 robeez!! http://tinyurl.com/6a4lt9
SO WINDY HERE!! It is freaky...things blowing away in the backyard. Tomorrow windy and 60 at noon...38 by 4. Yikes
Follow @wiimoms and join our Jan 3 twitter party for incredible giveaways! New year, new you challenge starts in 9 days!
Back in hospital. Blood clot at iv site from this wknd. Wish they had listened when I said I needed heparin.
I think it can't wait until tomorrow. Why can't I figure these things out during business hours?
Ok... I think I have a stupid blood clot in my arm where I had an iv this weekend...maybe just phlebitis...either way...
Anyone know anything about blood clots? Is it possible to get one near your elbow? Is there a major vein there?
